Module com.example.javaproject1
Package controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller class that deals with logic surrounding the main scene that shows parts and products in the corresponding tables and buttons to traverse to different scenes for parts or product FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: Add a third pane to the main screen, diving up the parts table to Part-InHouse and Part-Outsourced. This would allow for "at a glance" recognition of which parts are inhouse versus outsourced. This would be especially helpful as the part list grows. Each pane would also have the functionality to add/modify/delete parts and they woudl populate into the correct tables without needing to click the radio button. THe radio buttons will still be active so the user could still easily switch a part from inhouse to outsourced should they need to while creating it. The modify part will function the same for both panes as it does now. THe delete part button will also function the same.

    • onActionDeletePart

      void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method for delete part button. If-else statement for deletion of a part. If no part is selected, an error popup appears. Before final deletion a popup confirmation window will appear

    • onActionDisplayModifyPartMenu

      void onActionDisplayModifyPartMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Method that changes the scene from the Main Controller to the Modify Part Controller when the Modify button is pushed. If-else keeps the user on the main scene if no part is highlighted and only takes the user to the Modify Part Controller scene when a part is selected so the part information traverses scenes statement
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDisplayModifyProductMenu

      void onActionDisplayModifyProductMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Method that changes the scene from the Main Controller to the Modify Product Controller when the Modify button is pushed. If-else keeps the user on the main scene if no product is highlighted and only takes the user to the Modify Product Controller scene when a product is selected so the product information traverses scenes
      Throws:
      IOException
